entry.string: The Site Cloud module allows you to keep track on whether your favorite websites have changed. It uses the scheduler module to update or there is a feature within the admin to update at a click of a button.
entry.translation: Zee Seete-a Cluood mudoole-a elloos yuoo tu keep treck oon vhezeer yuoor fefureete-a vebseetes hefe-a chunged. It uses zee schedooler mudoole-a tu updete-a oor zeere-a is a feetoore-a veethin zee edmeen tu updete-a et a cleeck ooff a boottun. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: From the menu, you have three choices. "Modify Configuration", "Add sitecloud", and "View sitecloud".
entry.translation: Frum zee menoo, yuoo hefe-a three-a chueeces. "Mudeeffy Cunffeegooreshun", "Edd seetecluood", und "Feeoo seetecluood".

entry.string: Modify Configuration -- Allows you to update the global configuration for the module.
entry.translation: Mudeeffy Cunffeegooreshun -- Elloos yuoo tu updete-a zee glubel cunffeegooreshun fur zee mudoole-a.

entry.string: View site -- Allows you to view, edit and delete sites that you have active for your site.
entry.translation: Feeoo seete-a -- Elloos yuoo tu feeoo, ideet und delete-a seetes thet yuoo hefe-a ecteefe-a fur yuoor seete-a.

entry.string: Add site -- Allows you to add a new site to watch.
entry.translation: Edd seete-a -- Elloos yuoo tu edd a noo seete-a tu vetch.
